feed.title: Combined summary - CTV Meeting #8 Reminder + Agenda (Tuesday, May 3rd, 12:00 PT / 7PM UTC)

entry.title: Combined summary - CTV Meeting #8 Reminder + Agenda (Tuesday, May 3rd, 12:00 PT / 7PM UTC)
entry.summary: Hello developers, tomorrow at 12:00 Pacific Time, the CTV Meeting will be held in ##ctv-bip-review on Libera. The meeting will be an open forum for discussion guided by the participants. If you have any topics that you would like to discuss during the meeting, it is recommended that you propose them in advance in the IRC. This will allow for proper allocation of time to the subjects that are important to you.The purpose of the CTV Meeting is to provide a platform for developers to share their thoughts and ideas on various topics. As such, it is expected that the meeting will cover a wide range of issues. The meeting is open to all developers who are interested in contributing to the community.It is important to note that the meeting will take place on Libera, which is a free and open-source communication platform. The use of Libera ensures that the meeting will be accessible to all developers, regardless of their location or technical expertise.In conclusion, we encourage all developers to attend the CTV Meeting tomorrow at 12:00 Pacific Time in ##ctv-bip-review on Libera. By participating in the meeting, you will have the opportunity to share your opinions on various topics and contribute to the overall development of the community. Thank you and best regards from Jeremy.
